aboutUser:
Hello! My name is Naman Parashar, I am a budding Full Stack developer from India. My interest in Web Development started back in 2020 when I decided to contribute to ACE!
Right now I am pursuing Bachelor of Computer Application from Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University. I am looking for opportunities that will help me in growing my tech knowledge.I am still a learner who still needs to learn lot of new things. I love to code, watch anime and listen music.

1.name: Windows 11
1.content: Microsoft Windows 11 Mobile UI concept using Figma. A prototype on Google Pixel 2.

2.name: Kindle Concept
2.content: Amazon Kindle WebApp concept made using React, Express, MongoDb. It uses JWT auth for creating accounts.

3.name: ColtOS
3.content: Made website for Opensource Project 'Colt OS' using Vanilla HTML, CSS, JS.

4.name: Note.it
4.content: Notes App which stores data to LocalStorage and includes Firebase Auth, using HTML, CSS, JS.
